My name is Ruiqi Chen (陈睿琪 in Chinese and Рики in Russian). I also go by Riki. I am a Msc. student and Research Asistant at the Dept. Crystallography, Saint Petersburg State University (SPbU), Russia. My major is Structural Mineralogy and Material Science. I obtained bachelor’s degree in Geophysics and Geochemistry also from SPbU. I can be reached via ruiqi_chen at 163 dot com.
Currently I research on metamict minerals and their transformations under high-temparature conditions. During undergraduate, I study the synthesis, properties, and crystal-chemical features of some analogues of anhydrous sulfate minerals. Both are supported by Russian Science Foundation. I am fortunate to be advised by professor Oleg Siidra.
I am actively looking for both research and non-research jobs in Singapore, Europe, or China. You can find my cv here (Chinese version here).
